creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: seated woman in profile, holding torch out in PR hand, and a heart with an arrow pointing toward a lion in her PL hand; she gazes into the face of a large black bird standing behind her
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, Label

inscribed  monogram in plate, lower left: [VS]
provenance: [Kennedy Galleries, no. 19494; sold to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Choleric Temperament
